author: Adnan Ahmed

comments.comment: Package managers for popular languages; PHP: Composer, Node.JS: NPM, Python: Pip, Ruby: RubyGems, Java: Maven.
Try to implement best practices refactors in open source projects on Github.
Should learn to implement Redis and Memcached.
Several types of authentication to look into; Token, OAuth, JWT.
For Message Brokers; RabbitMQ and Kafka are dominant in industry.

description: List of steps to building out skills as a backend developer.

quotes.quote: If you have some frontend knowledge, you might find Node.js to be quite easier plus there is a big job market for that.

If you have already been doing backend development and know some scripting language, I would recommend you to not pick another scripting language and pick something from the "Functional" or "Multiparadigm" section.
Read the OWASP guidelines and understand different security issues and how to avoid them in language of your choice.

title: Learn to become a Backend Developer
